name: NewYorker
text: Kimberly Guilfoyle has maintained that her decision to leave Fox News, in 2018, was entirely voluntary. In a new investigation, Jane Mayer confirms that the network forced her out after a former assistant alleged sexual harassment against the host. https://t.co/IAWH0aWsIB

text: Joan Didion, who worked as a junior editor at Vogue, said that producing photo captions was part of mounting “the monthly grand illusion” of a glossy magazine. https://t.co/Er0JO7IWdo

name: NewYorker
text: "On Saturday, March 21st, one of our nurses has a fever. We’re both in the COVID tent, bundled up against yet another day of frigid rain, but I’m the only one wearing P.P.E., because she’s now the patient." https://t.co/4LyGSWajjP
